output.name: target1
output.text: He hoped there would be stew for dinner, turnips and carrots and bruised potatoes and fat mutton pieces to be ladled out in thick peppered flour fattened sauce. Stuff it into you, his belly counselled him.

output.name: target1
output.text: It would be a gloomy secret night.

output.name: target1
output.text: After early nightfall the yellow lamps would light up, here and there, the squalid quarter of the brothels.

output.name: target1
output.text: He would follow a devious course up and down the streets, circling always nearer and nearer in a tremor of fear and joy, until his feet led him suddenly round a dark corner.

output.name: target1
output.text: The whores would be just coming out of their houses making ready for the night, yawning lazily after their sleep and settling the hairpins in their clusters of hair. output.name: target1

output.text: The stars began to crumble and a cloud of fine stardust fell through space.

output.name: target1
output.text: The dull light fell more faintly upon the page whereon another equation began to unfold itself slowly and to spread abroad its widening tail. They were quenched: and the cold darkness filled chaos.

output.name: target1
output.text: A cold lucid indifference reigned in his soul.
output.token: A <space> c o l d <space> l u c i d <space> i n d i f f e r e n c e <space> r e i g n e d <space> i n <space> h i s <space> s o u l .

output.name: target1
output.text: At his first violent sin he had felt a wave of vitality pass out of him and had feared to find his body or his soul maimed by the excess.

output.name: target1
output.text: Instead the vital wave had carried him on its bosom out of himself and back again when it receded: and no part of body or soul had been maimed but a dark peace had been established between them.

output.name: target1
output.text: The chaos in which his ardour extinguished itself was a cold indifferent knowledge of himself.

output.name: target1
output.text: He had sinned mortally not once but many times and he knew that, while he stood in danger of eternal damnation for the first sin alone, by every succeeding sin he multiplied his guilt and his punishment.
output.token: H e <space> h a d <space> s i n n e d <space> m o r t a l l y <space> n o t <space> o n c e <space> b u t <space> m a n y <space> t i m e s <space> a n d <space> h e <space> k n e w <space> t h a t , <space> w h i l e <space> h e <space> s t o o d <space> i n <space> d a n g e r <space> o f <space> e t e r n a l <space> d a m n a t i o n <space> f o r <space> t h e <space> f i r s t <space> s i n <space> a l o n e , <space> b y <space> e v e r y <space> s u c c e e d i n g <space> s i n <space> h e <space> m u l t i p l i e d <space> h i s <space> g u i l t <space> a n d <space> h i s <space> p u n i s h m e n t .

output.name: target1
output.text: His days and works and thoughts could make no atonement for him, the fountains of sanctifying grace having ceased to refresh his soul.

output.name: target1
output.text: At most, by an alms given to a beggar whose blessing he fled from, he might hope wearily to win for himself some measure of actual grace.

output.name: target1
output.text: Devotion had gone by the board.
output.token: D e v o t i o n <space> h a d <space> g o n e <space> b y <space> t h e <space> b o a r d .

output.name: target1
output.text: What did it avail to pray when he knew that his soul lusted after its own destruction?
output.token: W h a t <space> d i d <space> i t <space> a v a i l <space> t o <space> p r a y <space> w h e n <space> h e <space> k n e w <space> t h a t <space> h i s <space> s o u l <space> l u s t e d <space> a f t e r <space> i t s <space> o w n <space> d e s t r u c t i o n ?

output.name: target1
output.text: A certain pride, a certain awe, withheld him from offering to God even one prayer at night, though he knew it was in God's power to take away his life while he slept and hurl his soul hellward ere he could beg for mercy.

output.name: target1
output.text: His pride in his own sin, his loveless awe of God, told him that his offence was too grievous to be atoned for in whole or in part by a false homage to the All seeing and All knowing.

output.name: target1
output.text: --Well now, Ennis, I declare you have a head and so has my stick!

output.name: target1
output.text: Do you mean to say that you are not able to tell me what a surd is?

output.name: target1
output.text: Towards others he felt neither shame nor fear.
output.token: T o w a r d s <space> o t h e r s <space> h e <space> f e l t <space> n e i t h e r <space> s h a m e <space> n o r <space> f e a r .

output.name: target1
output.text: On Sunday mornings as he passed the church door he glanced coldly at the worshippers who stood bareheaded, four deep, outside the church, morally present at the mass which they could neither see nor hear. Their dull piety and the sickly smell of the cheap hair oil with which they had anointed their heads repelled him from the altar they prayed at.
output.token: O n <space> S u n d a y <space> m o r n i n g s <space> a s <space> h e <space> p a s s e d <space> t h e <space> c h u r c h <space> d o o r <space> h e <space> g l a n c e d <space> c o l d l y <space> a t <space> t h e <space> w o r s h i p p e r s <space> w h o <space> s t o o d <space> b a r e h e a d e d , <space> f o u r <space> d e e p , <space> o u t s i d e <space> t h e <space> c h u r c h , <space> m o r a l l y <space> p r e s e n t <space> a t <space> t h e <space> m a s s <space> w h i c h <space> t h e y <space> c o u l d <space> n e i t h e r <space> s e e <space> n o r <space> h e a r . <space> T h e i r <space> d u l l <space> p i e t y <space> a n d <space> t h e <space> s i c k l y <space> s m e l l <space> o f <space> t h e <space> c h e a p <space> h a i r <space> o i l <space> w i t h <space> w h i c h <space> t h e y <space> h a d <space> a n o i n t e d <space> t h e i r <space> h e a d s <space> r e p e l l e d <space> h i m <space> f r o m <space> t h e <space> a l t a r <space> t h e y <space> p r a y e d <space> a t .

output.name: target1
output.text: He stooped to the evil of hypocrisy with others, sceptical of their innocence which he could cajole so easily.

output.name: target1
output.text: On the wall of his bedroom hung an illuminated scroll, the certificate of his prefecture in the college of the sodality of the Blessed Virgin Mary.
output.token: O n <space> t h e <space> w a l l <space> o f <space> h i s <space> b e d r o o m <space> h u n g <space> a n <space> i l l u m i n a t e d <space> s c r o l l , <space> t h e <space> c e r t i f i c a t e <space> o f <space> h i s <space> p r e f e c t u r e <space> i n <space> t h e <space> c o l l e g e <space> o f <space> t h e <space> s o d a l i t y <space> o f <space> t h e <space> B l e s s e d <space> V i r g i n <space> M a r y .

output.name: target1
output.text: The falsehood of his position did not pain him.
output.token: T h e <space> f a l s e h o o d <space> o f <space> h i s <space> p o s i t i o n <space> d i d <space> n o t <space> p a i n <space> h i m .

output.name: target1
output.text: If at moments he felt an impulse to rise from his post of honour and, confessing before them all his unworthiness, to leave the chapel, a glance at their faces restrained him.

output.name: target1
output.text: The imagery of the psalms of prophecy soothed his barren pride.

output.name: target1
output.text: Her eyes seemed to regard him with mild pity; her holiness, a strange light glowing faintly upon her frail flesh, did not humiliate the sinner who approached her.

output.name: target1
output.text: If ever he was impelled to cast sin from him and to repent the impulse that moved him was the wish to be her knight.

output.name: target1
output.text: If ever his soul, re entering her dwelling shyly after the frenzy of his body's lust had spent itself, was turned towards her whose emblem is the morning star, BRIGHT AND MUSICAL, TELLING OF HEAVEN AND INFUSING PEACE, it was when her names were murmured softly by lips whereon there still lingered foul and shameful words, the savour itself of a lewd kiss.

output.name: target1
output.text: As he sat in his bench gazing calmly at the rector's shrewd harsh face, his mind wound itself in and out of the curious questions proposed to it.

output.name: target1

output.name: target1
output.text: If a layman in giving baptism pour the water before saying the words is the child baptized?

output.name: target1

output.name: target1
output.text: Does a tiny particle of the consecrated bread contain all the body and blood of Jesus Christ or a part only of the body and blood?

output.name: target1
output.text: If any boys have special confessors perhaps it will be better for them not to change.

output.name: target1
output.text: Mass will be on Saturday morning at nine o'clock and general communion for the whole college.

output.name: target1

output.name: target1
output.text: The rector went on gravely:
output.token: T h e <space> r e c t o r <space> w e n t <space> o n <space> g r a v e l y :

output.name: target1
output.text: --You are all familiar with the story of the life of saint Francis Xavier, I suppose, the patron of your college.
output.token: - - Y o u <space> a r e <space> a l l <space> f a m i l i a r <space> w i t h <space> t h e <space> s t o r y <space> o f <space> t h e <space> l i f e <space> o f <space> s a i n t <space> F r a n c i s <space> X a v i e r , <space> I <space> s u p p o s e , <space> t h e <space> p a t r o n <space> o f <space> y o u r <space> c o l l e g e .

output.name: target1
output.text: He came of an old and illustrious Spanish family and you remember that he was one of the first followers of saint Ignatius.

output.name: target1
output.text: He is called, as you know, the apostle of the Indies.

output.name: target1
output.text: He went from country to country in the east, from Africa to India, from India to Japan, baptizing the people.
output.token: H e <space> w e n t <space> f r o m <space> c o u n t r y <space> t o <space> c o u n t r y <space> i n <space> t h e <space> e a s t , <space> f r o m <space> A f r i c a <space> t o <space> I n d i a , <space> f r o m <space> I n d i a <space> t o <space> J a p a n , <space> b a p t i z i n g <space> t h e <space> p e o p l e .

output.name: target1
output.text: He is said to have baptized as many as ten thousand idolaters in one month.
output.token: H e <space> i s <space> s a i d <space> t o <space> h a v e <space> b a p t i z e d <space> a s <space> m a n y <space> a s <space> t e n <space> t h o u s a n d <space> i d o l a t e r s <space> i n <space> o n e <space> m o n t h .

output.name: target1
output.text: It is said that his right arm had grown powerless from having been raised so often over the heads of those whom he baptized. He wished then to go to China to win still more souls for God but he died of fever on the island of Sancian.
output.token: I t <space> i s <space> s a i d <space> t h a t <space> h i s <space> r i g h t <space> a r m <space> h a d <space> g r o w n <space> p o w e r l e s s <space> f r o m <space> h a v i n g <space> b e e n <space> r a i s e d <space> s o <space> o f t e n <space> o v e r <space> t h e <space> h e a d s <space> o f <space> t h o s e <space> w h o m <space> h e <space> b a p t i z e d . <space> H e <space> w i s h e d <space> t h e n <space> t o <space> g o <space> t o <space> C h i n a <space> t o <space> w i n <space> s t i l l <space> m o r e <space> s o u l s <space> f o r <space> G o d <space> b u t <space> h e <space> d i e d <space> o f <space> f e v e r <space> o n <space> t h e <space> i s l a n d <space> o f <space> S a n c i a n .

output.name: target1
output.text: A great saint, saint Francis Xavier!
output.token: A <space> g r e a t <space> s a i n t , <space> s a i n t <space> F r a n c i s <space> X a v i e r !

output.name: target1
output.text: A great soldier of God!
output.token: A <space> g r e a t <space> s o l d i e r <space> o f <space> G o d !

output.name: target1
output.text: --He had the faith in him that moves mountains.
output.token: - - H e <space> h a d <space> t h e <space> f a i t h <space> i n <space> h i m <space> t h a t <space> m o v e s <space> m o u n t a i n s .

output.name: target1
output.text: Ten thousand souls won for God in a single month!
output.token: T e n <space> t h o u s a n d <space> s o u l s <space> w o n <space> f o r <space> G o d <space> i n <space> a <space> s i n g l e <space> m o n t h !

output.name: target1
output.text: A saint who has great power in heaven, remember: power to intercede for us in our grief; power to obtain whatever we pray for if it be for the good of our souls; power above all to obtain for us the grace to repent if we be in sin.
output.token: A <space> s a i n t <space> w h o <space> h a s <space> g r e a t <space> p o w e r <space> i n <space> h e a v e n , <space> r e m e m b e r : <space> p o w e r <space> t o <space> i n t e r c e d e <space> f o r <space> u s <space> i n <space> o u r <space> g r i e f ; <space> p o w e r <space> t o <space> o b t a i n <space> w h a t e v e r <space> w e <space> p r a y <space> f o r <space> i f <space> i t <space> b e <space> f o r <space> t h e <space> g o o d <space> o f <space> o u r <space> s o u l s ; <space> p o w e r <space> a b o v e <space> a l l <space> t o <space> o b t a i n <space> f o r <space> u s <space> t h e <space> g r a c e <space> t o <space> r e p e n t <space> i f <space> w e <space> b e <space> i n <space> s i n .

output.name: target1
output.text: A great saint, saint Francis Xavier!
output.token: A <space> g r e a t <space> s a i n t , <space> s a i n t <space> F r a n c i s <space> X a v i e r !

output.name: target1
output.text: A great fisher of souls!
output.token: A <space> g r e a t <space> f i s h e r <space> o f <space> s o u l s !

output.name: target1
output.text: He ceased to shake his clasped hands and, resting them against his forehead, looked right and left of them keenly at his listeners out of his dark stern eyes.
output.token: H e <space> c e a s e d <space> t o <space> s h a k e <space> h i s <space> c l a s p e d <space> h a n d s <space> a n d , <space> r e s t i n g <space> t h e m <space> a g a i n s t <space> h i s <space> f o r e h e a d , <space> l o o k e d <space> r i g h t <space> a n d <space> l e f t <space> o f <space> t h e m <space> k e e n l y <space> a t <space> h i s <space> l i s t e n e r s <space> o u t <space> o f <space> h i s <space> d a r k <space> s t e r n <space> e y e s .

output.name: target1
output.text: He could wait no longer.
output.token: H e <space> c o u l d <space> w a i t <space> n o <space> l o n g e r .

output.name: target1
output.text: A full hour had passed since his father had gone in with Dan Crosby, the tutor, to find out for him something about the university.
output.token: A <space> f u l l <space> h o u r <space> h a d <space> p a s s e d <space> s i n c e <space> h i s <space> f a t h e r <space> h a d <space> g o n e <space> i n <space> w i t h <space> D a n <space> C r o s b y , <space> t h e <space> t u t o r , <space> t o <space> f i n d <space> o u t <space> f o r <space> h i m <space> s o m e t h i n g <space> a b o u t <space> t h e <space> u n i v e r s i t y .

output.name: target1
output.text: For a full hour he had paced up and down, waiting: but he could wait no longer.
output.token: F o r <space> a <space> f u l l <space> h o u r <space> h e <space> h a d <space> p a c e d <space> u p <space> a n d <space> d o w n , <space> w a i t i n g : <space> b u t <space> h e <space> c o u l d <space> w a i t <space> n o <space> l o n g e r .

output.name: target1
output.text: He set off abruptly for the Bull, walking rapidly lest his father's shrill whistle might call him back; and in a few moments he had rounded the curve at the police barrack and was safe.
output.token: H e <space> s e t <space> o f f <space> a b r u p t l y <space> f o r <space> t h e <space> B u l l , <space> w a l k i n g <space> r a p i d l y <space> l e s t <space> h i s <space> f a t h e r ' s <space> s h r i l l <space> w h i s t l e <space> m i g h t <space> c a l l <space> h i m <space> b a c k ; <space> a n d <space> i n <space> a <space> f e w <space> m o m e n t s <space> h e <space> h a d <space> r o u n d e d <space> t h e <space> c u r v e <space> a t <space> t h e <space> p o l i c e <space> b a r r a c k <space> a n d <space> w a s <space> s a f e .

output.name: target1
output.text: Yes, his mother was hostile to the idea, as he had read from her listless silence.
